name: The Wizard and The Firefly
description:
Welcome! 

The Great and Powerful Wizard has been imprisoned by dastardly evildoers and has been robbed of all but his simplest abilities.

Together with a magical Light-giving Firefly, the unlikely pair must fight their way through the pitch black dungeon to reclaim what was wrongfully stolen. 

But beware, you are not the only one lurking in the dark of those cold stone halls...

Controls:

WASD and Arrow Keys to move 

Q - Switch between The Wizard and The Firefly 

F - Recall The Firefly to The Wizard and force a follow-behind

E - Switch to The Wizard and force a follow

Left Click - Fire your trusty Magic Missile!

If The Firefly gets too far away from The Wizard then The Wizard's light will slowly fade away until the darkness consumes him. 

Light-devouring monsters will target The Firefly and begin to drain its light until there's nothing left but the harsh sting of death.
